text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Look, that tree's glowing! And so is<n>the inside of the pool!
This is so, so<n>cool! It's like a world of magic!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Seriously! This place looks completely<n>different at nighttime!
We should invite<n>Taishin and the others next time!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Good idea! Apparently, they only light<n>up the area like this at
night! ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Scarlet, are you sure you want to<n>stay? You're not forcing
yourself to<n>be here, are you?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, I'm not. I thought about<n>it and decided I should
stay. Besides...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'd forgotten, actually, but my mom<n>sent me a swimsuit. She
told me to go<n>out and have fun once in a while.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...She seemed to think I needed it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (I had no idea. So her mom said the<n>same thing...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
In that case, we wouldn't want to<n>upset your mom! Let's
make sure<n>you have some fun! Hehe!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so...

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Gah! What is this sparkly ball?! Why<n>is it shining?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I know! Let's play a game!<n>Whoever manages to keep
the ball<n>until the very end wins!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
That's a great idea. That might be a<n>good training exerci—oh,
forget<n>training! I'm not losing to any of you<n>if we're doing
this!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'll do my best too! ...Huh? Where are<n>all these bubbles
coming from?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. We ran into quite a few<n>roadblocks... but I'm glad
everyone is<n>having fun.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: All right! I'll join in too! Woooo! ♪

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Is this really safe? Are we surethis is safe? Is it actually okay forthree people to be on this thing?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, it's a three-seater!<n>Come on, keep your eyes
open and<n>go, go, gooo! ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah-ah-aaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Fwoooosh!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh my gosh, oh my gosh... No, no,<n>nooo! This is way too
faaast!

text_block_list.name: Spe and Scarlet
text_block_list.text: AAAAAHHHHH!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Splash!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Ahaha! That was so scary!<n>But it was fun too!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yeah... I was so scared, I thought I<n>was a goner. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sparkling laughter echoes across the<n>night pool. Then, at the
end of the<n>night...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ahh... All I did was play, but I'm<n>exhausted. I still can't get
over how<n>pretty the pool looked, all lit up and<n>glittery...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I agree! They didn't have anything<n>like that before. I
suppose even<n>Bubblyland isn't immune to change.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: How was today, Scarlet? Did you<n>have fun?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...I did. It's stressful to think about<n>how I haven't done any
training, but...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I suppose... it's not so bad to let<n>loose once in a while.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Why don't we have just a little bit<n>more fun tomorrow
before we go<n>home, then?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Let's do it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And when the next day rolls around...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Woooo! ♪ It's all about the disco<n>when you come to
Bubblyland!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Um, is it really okay for us to be up<n>here?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Of course! Dance floors are made tobe danced on! Come on, get intothe groove! There's no half-hearted dancing allowed here!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
She's right. Apparently, the most<n>important thing at a disco
is to let go of<n>all your worries and dance your heart<n>out!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You say that as if it's easy to do<n>either of those things...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...No, I can't be like this. I'm here<n>now, so I'm going to do it
right or it's<n>a waste of time.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I'm going to dance with everything<n>I've got!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: M-me too!

text_block_list.name: Man A
text_block_list.text:
Hang on! Isn't that Special Week and<n>Daiwa Scarlet next to
Maruzensky?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Here I go... W-wooooo! Let's dance,<n>everyone!

text_block_list.name: Visitors
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I-I can do this too... Um... T-turn up that<n>music, DJ!

text_block_list.name: Visitors
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaay!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Great job, you two!
